strengths: Flexible infantry production via Letani Warriors
Late-game snowballing with rapid unit recovery
Flagship produces 5 infantry on landing, great for recovery after losses
weaknesses: Slow opening, vulnerable to early aggression
Susceptible to bombardment (Letnev, Muaat, Sardakk, L1Z1X)
Weak against fast-expanding factions early (Creuss, Saar, Sol)
tips: Play cautiously early; prepare for Stage II objectives
Start as speaker for survival advantage if possible
Obtain Sarween Tools and a second carrier by round 2
Root into opponent territories strategically â€” your infantry production makes you hard to dislodge
Use flagship for recovery after losses with its 5 infantry capacity

techPaths.name: Green + Yellow/Red (with green skip)
techPaths.note: Optimal path; leverages your green starting advantage

techPaths.name: Blue + Yellow
techPaths.note: Alternative if no green skip available
